data.title: Courteney Meanings in English, Popularity, Origin
data.meta_description: Courteney is a Christian English baby girl name. Its meaning is "From The Court". Courteney name origin is English. , Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
Courteney Name Meaning in English

What does the name Courteney mean? What is the meaning of the name Courteney, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

From an aristocratic English surname which was derived either from the French place name Courtenay (originally a derivative of the personal name Curtenus, itself derived from Latin curtus "short") or else from a Norman nickname meaning "short nose".

Courteney Name Meaning, Origin & Details

Meaning: From the court Short Info: Courteney Cox played the character of Monica Geller in the American television series "Friends". Details: Originally an English surname, which could either be from the French place name, Courtenay, or from the name Curtis, from the French courtois, meaning "courteous". Gender: Girl Origin: English Religion: Christian Suitable for: Girls / Female / Women Hardness: Hard to pronounce Uniqueness: Rare / It is unique name Short & Easy: No Syllables: 9 Letters and 1 Words
